name: typedpack
description: Helper functions for TypeScript code generated by `typedpack-cli`.

scripts.build: swc --out-dir dist/ --strip-leading-paths src/ && pnpm run generate-types
scripts.check: pnpm run generate-test-types && pnpm run build && tsc --build tests/
scripts.format: prettier --write src/ tests/ eslint.config.js package.json tsconfig.base.json
scripts.test: pnpm run check && pnpm run build:tests && ava
